scripts.build: npm run build:client && npm run build:server
scripts.build:client: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const cp=require('child_process');const candidates=['client','frontend','web','app','src','src/client','public','.'];let root=null;for(const d of candidates){if(fs.existsSync(d+'/index.html')){root=d;break;}}if(!root){console.error('Vite build failed: could not find index.html in any of: '+candidates.join(', '));process.exit(1);}console.log('Vite root:',root);cp.execSync('npx vite build --outDir ../dist/public',{stdio:'inherit',cwd:root});"
scripts.build:server: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const entry=fs.existsSync('server/index.ts')?'server/index.ts':(fs.existsSync('src/index.ts')?'src/index.ts':null);if(!entry){console.error('Missing entry: server/index.ts or src/index.ts');process.exit(1)};console.log('Building:',entry)" && npx esbuild $(node -e "const fs=require('fs');process.stdout.write(fs.existsSync('server/index.ts')?'server/index.ts':'src/index.ts')") --bundle --platform=node --format=cjs --outfile=dist/index.cjs --packages=external
